articles.description: This wasn't exactly a banner year for Boeing stock holders, but today there's a rare chance to own the shares in anticipation of a rebound.
articles.content:
If you’ve been in the markets for a while, you might recall a time when Boeing (NYSE:BA
) was considered a safe investment. This year proved though, that nothing is completely safe in the markets – … [+3914 chars]

articles.author: Mackenzie Moore
articles.title: A local Christmas miracle: Baby born at nearly 2.5 pounds on Christmas Day - WJHL-TV News Channel 11
articles.description: JOHNSON CITY, Tenn. (WJHL) — Many people receive presents in the form of material items, but this Christmas, one local mother received the best gift of all — the gift of life after giving birth to 2.47-pound Parker Danny Wayne Ball. News Channel 11 reached ou…
